Adult Disney Jack Skellington Halloween Costume Adult Disney Jack Skellington Halloween Costume Sorry, out of stock. Order now and receive the product as soon as we have it in stock. We've only got left of the item you have chosen but we've got more on order. We'll dispatch now and the other items within . Quantity Why we love this If you’re a sucker for Disney and love fuss-free dress up, this Jack Skellington costume is a quick, cool way to add a dose of spooky spirit. Complete with a striped t-shirt and mask, it’s a fab pick for last minute plans. • 2 piece • Tim Burton’s The Nightmare Before Christmas • T-shirt and mask Fabric composition: Main body: 100% Polyester Excluding Trim Collect in an ASDA store FREE Delivery When can I get this by? International delivery When can I get this by? Free Returns Return in any ASDA store FREE Not happy with your George clothing item? Simply return it to store within 100 days with your proof of purchase for a refund or exchange. Subject to our 100 day guarantee terms and conditions . Information on how to return clothing items can be found here . Returning an item from outside the UK? Returning an item from outside the UK is easy. Simply, download and print a cancellation form . Repack your item along with this form and send back to the address stated on the form.
We recommend you use a postal service that insures your contents and gives you proof of postage. Postage will be at your own cost. posts.title: Elf-shaped Mug | Home & Garden | George
posts.text:
Standard Purchase 19.9% P.A. (Variable) Representative APR 19.9% P.A. (Variable) Based on assumed credit limit of £1,200 Selected purchase & terms* Follow these three simple steps: Add item to basket Check your eligibility Place your order 
Add item to basket , select ‘Apply for & pay with an Asda Cashback Credit Card’ at checkout. 
Just fill in a short application form and carry out a simple eligibility check – which will have no impact on your credit score. Get a credit decision and you can expect to receive your Asda Cashback Credit Card in the post within 10 working days of a successful application. 
Review , place your order and enjoy the benefits today tell me more * For purchases of £200 or more online at George.com (after any applicable discount): No interest shall be charged on qualifying purchase(s) for the six months following the date of purchase(s). After the six month period the interest rate for Standard Purchases applicable to the account is then payable on any remaining balance of the purchase. To qualify, purchases must be made at George.com on a valid Asda Cashback Credit Card in a single transaction. When instant credit is granted you may draw up to £700 or your credit limit, whichever is the lower. Instant credit may only be used once and is only offered on selected purchases. Should you wish to purchase goods that are not applicable for instant credit you will not be able to apply for an Asda Cashback Credit Card at the checkout. Your instant credit limit may be lower than your credit limit. The promotion may be withdrawn or extended by Asda Money at any time without prior notice. If you do not make at least your minimum payment on time or you exceed your credit limit you will lose the promotional rate and any balance will be charged at the standard rate. Asda Stores Limited (Great Wilson Street, Leeds, LS11 5AD), trading as Asda Money, acts as a credit broker not as a lender and is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority. Asda Stores Limited only offers credit cards provided by Creation Financial Services Limited. Credit issued subject to status. Applicants must be aged 18 or over and UK resident. Credit issued subject to status. Our customers say Read all Elf-shaped Mug reviews Elf-shaped Mug is rated 5.0 out of 5 by 1 . Rated 5 out of 5 by KittyMooomin from Festive fun What a cheeky little mug impossible to resist! Perfect for my daughter's Christmas Eve drink, she will love having a hot chocolate in it but the cheeky Elves will have filled it with jelly and topped with whipped cream instead! They do get up to the most awful mischief in my house!! I can't wait for it to arrive! Date published: 2017-10-15
